SELECT v.movie_code, m.movie_name, m.movie_director, m.movie_actor, m.age_limit , m.movie_genre, m.release_date, m.running_time, m.movie_img1, m.movie_rating , IFNULL(count(*), 0) AS count FROM vote_box v LEFT OUTER JOIN movie m ON v.movie_code = m.movie_code WHERE vote_code = #{vote_code} GROUP BY movie_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC
